item.title: ConverzAI bags $16M for virtual recruiters that deliver 30% efficiency boost for enterprises
item.description: AI-driven virtual recruiters that handle key elements of the hiring process, from sourcing to engaging candidates to screening and placement.

item.title: Napkin AI’s ‘design agency’ of AI agents is changing how professionals create graphics
item.description: Graphic design company Napkin AI represents a new breed of vertical AI agents. A user can type some text in the Napkin AI's web site, and Napkin gener...

item.title: Ansys says simulations will close the gap with reality and make the world more sustainable
item.description: You may not have heard of Ansys, but it's in the process of being acquired by chip design tool firm Synopsys for $35 billion.

item.title: Would you stop using OpenAI’s ChatGPT and API if Elon Musk took it over?
item.description: It's hardly out-of-the-question that Musk could succeed. After all, his bid to takeover Twitter was also deemed a longshot.

item.title: Who’s using AI the most? The Anthropic Economic Index breaks down the data
item.description: Anthropic uncovers AI's true workforce impact: 57% augmentation vs 43% automation across industries, based on 4 million Claude interactions.
